com.phunware.phuncoin.core.asset

Interface AssetManager


  • public AssetManager

    A manager that facilitates getting the users current balance and redeeming offers through "instrumented events."

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void balance(AssetManager.BalanceListener callback)
      Get the Loyalty balance for current user.
      void fireEvent(java.lang.String eventName, java.util.List<java.lang.String> parameters, AssetManager.FireEventListener callback)
      Fire event for current user.

    • Method Detail

      • balance

        void balance(AssetManager.BalanceListener callback)

        Get the Loyalty balance for current user.

        Parameters:
        callback - Listener called with asset balance or with failure message.

      • fireEvent

        void fireEvent(java.lang.String eventName,
               java.util.List<java.lang.String> parameters,
               AssetManager.FireEventListener callback)

        Fire event for current user.

        Parameters:
        eventName - predefined string setup in Admin that allows the current user to redeem an offer.
        parameters - some events require optional parameters, such as the name of a recipe being unlocked
        callback - Listener called with success with event side effect or failure with error.
